mapper.select: SELECT N.nrefer, n.nsubject, n.ndate, u.nickname, n.readnum FROM NOTICEBOARD N JOIN USERINFO U ON N.EMAIL = U.EMAIL OFFSET (#{currPage}-1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT n.nrefer, n.nsubject, n.ncontent, n.ndate, u.nickname, n.readnum FROM NOTICEBOARD N JOIN USERINFO U ON N.email = U.email WHERE NREFER = #{nrefer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICEBOARD(NREFER, NSUBJECT, NCONTENT, NDATE, NICKNAME, EMAIL, READNUM) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICEBOARD.nextval, #{nsubject}, #{ncontent}, sysdate, 'admin', #{email}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(nrefer) FROM NOTICEBOARD WHERE nrefer > 0

SELECT N.NREFER, N.NSUBJECT, N.NDATE, U.NICKNAME, U.EMAIL FROM NOTICEBOARD N JOIN USERINFO U ON N.EMAIL = U.EMAIL WHERE N.NSUBJECT LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY NREFER DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage}-1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
